bibl.title: A Comparative Textual Analysis of P4 and P64+67.
bibl.note: P. Barc. Inv. 1 + P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex-18) + P. Paris Bibl. Nat., Suppl. Gr. 1120 (= van Haelst 336 + 403; LDAB 2936). - Introduction. - Earlier research on the text of P4 and P64+67. - Textual analysis of P4 and P64+67. - Greg.-Aland P4 (Paris Suppl. Gr. 1120): Corrections to transcription in editio princeps (Merell); - Apparatus; - Textual variation of P4; - Textual quality; - Transmission character. - Greg.-Aland P64+67 (Oxford, Magdalen College, Gr. 17; Barcelona, Fundaciòn San Lucas Evangelista, P. Barc. 1): Notes on transcription; - Apparatus; - Textual variation of P64+67; - Textual quality; - Transmission character. - Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism

bibl.seg: Tommy Wasserman, A Comparative Textual Analysis of P4 and P64+67.
TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 15 (2010) 26 pp., 4 tabl.

P. Barc. Inv. 1 + P. Oxford Magdalen College Inv. Gr. 17 (ex-18) + P. Paris Bibl. Nat., Suppl.
